subject: Re: SSU | Gallery files
preview: Thanks @jaime harvest updated to +30, update sent from personal email.

full_threads.body:
Thanks @jaime 
harvest updated to +30, update sent from personal email.

Hello @chris , the issue with the gallery not displaying on mobile has been resolved. There was a separate mobile gallery menu, which has now been updated.

Screenshot


Time: +5mins
@jaime gallery isn't showing on mobile, can you please make sure it appears?

Hi @chris done adding gallery in main nav

Screenshot


Time: +5mins @ricaR

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Please see below from Dr Sushil.

Attached is a screenshot for the location of the gallery button.

Pease disregard the request to add “articles” as there is no content yet, I will let Dr Sushil know we need content before adding the section.

￼

Thanks Chris
I have added the relevant pics to the gallery and updated
. Can we push live with a separate gallery button at top?
also add the article button now?

Thanks

SP

__

Dr Sushil PANT
Orthopaedic Shoulder Surgeon | Sydney Shoulder Unit

Suite 211, 203-233 New South Head Road, Edgecliff NSW 2027
P: 02 9215 6100 | F: 02 9215 6190 | M: 0416 204 770

<https://sydneyshoulderunit.com.au/>
